Class FileUploadThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.extension.FileUploadThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileUploadThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    It creates a thread that upload and store a flip file into the database

    patricio

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileUploadThread

        public FileUploadThread(org.apache.struts.upload.FormFile file,
                        java.lang.String filename,
                        long size,
                        UserBean userBean,
                        java.lang.String type)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        file - : A FormFile file object. This object is created automatically when user selects a file to upload
        filename - : Name of the file
        size - : Size of the file
        userBean - : A UserBean object representing the user that wants to upload a flip file
        type - : The type of flip file. A flip file can be either a "population" file or a "genome" file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
